channel.title: OptimusX - A new server online now!
channel.description:
[center] [IMG]http://img823.imageshack.us/img823/6382/134126721450377135.gif[/img]
[url=http://uppit.com/ts9r75xyu0l7/OptimusX_V1.1.rar]Client download[/url] [url=http://www.Rune--Locus.com/toplist/vote-13798.html]Rune--Locus Vote[/url] (When you click Rune--Locus, take the 2 -'s off. [url=http://google.com/top.php?act=detail&sid=6169]Rune-Server[/url]
OptimusX is an old school server that is brand new. By brand new, I mean brand new. We started July 1st. Our server features barrows, pest control, and the most main part, PKing.
- 24/7 With The Most Amazing Pking Ever - We Do Not Tolerate Any Non Sense From Staff - We Are Still New Made In Late June, So You Could Get Ahead Of The Game - Easy Money Making For Faster Pking - Our Own FaceBook Page! With The Most Recent Updates! - We Listen To Our Players, Unlike Some Other RSPS's Out There - We Try To Make Players Have The Best Time Possible - Minigames ex: PC, Tzhaar Cave, Barrows - Daily Events! - Working Custom God Wars - Reward Points Which Can Be Earned By Skilling Or Pking - VPS protected 24/7 no lag anti ddos - Active Updates! - And Lots More!
Media:
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=s69J2ogn2y0[/youtube]
Remember Mr.Old Whip?:
[IMG]http://img35.imageshack.us/img35/1721/whipiw.png[/img]
Customs:
[IMG]http://img444.imageshack.us/img444/969/customsm.png[/img]
Bridding
[IMG]http://img515.imageshack.us/img515/3015/bridding.png[/img][/center]

item.title: OptimusX - A new server online now!
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Lin:

To be honest, I do like the colored whips just because of how fun they were back before there were 317s “loading 634” or whatever. Though, as usual, I would never play this server just because it’s based in Edgeville, and focused on PKing. And this alone: “- When You Donate You Get Recoginized And Lots Of Benefits” makes it a terrible server. Sorry.

:O. I didnt see i said that. I just copied the -'s from doritos owns post on runelocus.

Read full topic

at any rate good luck
[/quote]

[center]

Client download
Rune–Locus Vote (When you click Rune–Locus, take the 2 -'s off.
Rune-Server

OptimusX is an old school server that is brand new. By brand new, I mean brand new. We started July 1st. Our server features barrows, pest control, and the most main part, PKing.

  • 24/7 With The Most Amazing Pking Ever
  • We Do Not Tolerate Any Non Sense From Staff
  • We Are Still New Made In Late June, So You Could Get Ahead Of The Game
  • Easy Money Making For Faster Pking
  • Our Own FaceBook Page! With The Most Recent Updates!
  • We Listen To Our Players, Unlike Some Other RSPS’s Out There
  • We Try To Make Players Have The Best Time Possible
  • Minigames ex: PC, Tzhaar Cave, Barrows
  • Daily Events!
  • Working Custom God Wars
  • Reward Points Which Can Be Earned By Skilling Or Pking
  • VPS protected 24/7 no lag anti ddos
  • Active Updates!
  • And Lots More!
